project: Ticketmaster Event Discovery App - Frontend Refactor

done.name: Install Dependencies and Setup Theme Foundation
done.description: Installed styled-components v6, created theme system with light/dark themes, typography tokens, z-index scale

done.name: Create Button Atom
done.description: Reusable Button component with primary/secondary variants, three sizes, full theme integration, focus-visible accessibility

done.name: Create Input Atom
done.description: Text input with error states, focus-visible ring, hover effects, disabled state, full theme integration

done.name: Create Label Atom
done.description: Form label with consistent typography and spacing

done.name: Create Select Atom
done.description: Dropdown selector with focus-visible, hover effects, disabled state

done.name: Create Checkbox Atom
done.description: Checkbox with optional label, accent-color theming, disabled state

done.name: Create RadiusSelector Molecule
done.description: Label + Select for radius selection (5-100 km)

done.name: Create DateRangePicker Molecule
done.description: Start/end date inputs with labels and validation

done.name: Create EventTypeFilter Molecule
done.description: Multi-checkbox filter for event types (Music, Sports, Arts, Family)

done.name: Create CityAutocomplete Molecule
done.description: Input with dropdown suggestions for city search, smart filtering

done.name: Create EventCard Molecule
done.description: Event card with image, title, venue, date, price, hover animations

done.name: Create New SearchBar Organism
done.description: SearchBar using CityAutocomplete, RadiusSelector, DateRangePicker, EventTypeFilter, Button

done.name: Create New EventGrid Organism
done.description: Responsive grid using EventCard molecules with mobile/tablet/desktop layouts

done.name: Create New EventDetailModal Organism
done.description: Modal with event details, loading/error states, click-outside-to-close

todo.name: Create ThemeToggle Component
todo.description: Toggle button for switching between light/dark themes

todo.name: Integrate Styled Components into App.tsx
todo.description: Wrap app in ThemeProvider, replace old components with new styled versions

todo.name: Remove Old CSS Files
todo.description: Delete App.css, index.css, SearchBar.css, EventGrid.css, EventDetailModal.css

notes: Refactoring from CSS to styled-components with atomic design
All atoms, molecules, and organisms complete!
